name: Alder's Blood
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Grim, dark world to explore
  • Deep, turn-based combat system
  • Wide range of weapons and deadly artifacts
  • Unique gameplay mechanics
  • Beautiful, hand-painted visuals


About the Game

Ride with your crew of hunters on a quest to kill your god. Use stealth and tactics to overcome the never-ending onslaught of monsters, the manifestations of your god's decay. Manage your scarce resources, venture out with your fellow companions and explore the remnants of the world in search of the means for mankind's survival.


Hunters strike from the shadows, overcoming enemies with their use of tactics, specialized gear and dark arts. In 1 on 1 encounters even a hunter cannot match a beast, but together with others they can achieve great victories. Monsters can detect a hunter's presence by their scent. Observe the wind, avoid being noticed and prepare deadly ambushes! Hunting tools are as important as weapons. Hunters employ the use of some sophisticated technology, as well as dark artifacts.


The world is covered in constant dusk. “Day” and “night” are no longer a thing. The lunar light of the Moon ceaselessly illuminates the dark like a grim reminder of the curse. The god is no longer with us and the Nature is now the main enemy for the mankind. Crowded cities are filled with people, as these places are the last bastions of hope. Citizens still wait for a certain death, having an illusion of security and safety. Constant waves of dark creatures destroyed most of the civilization’s work. However, even in the darkest night, there is always a glimmer of hope. Hunters reunited once again. After regaining their forces, they will lead the last fight in the name of humanity.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800GTX with 512MB of memory or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
